mod.name: Super Factory Manager
item.sfm.disk.tooltip.label: - %s: %d blocks
item.sfm.labelgun.tooltip.1: Right click a Factory Manager to push labels.
item.sfm.labelgun.tooltip.2: Right click a Factory Manager while sneaking to pull labels.
item.sfm.water_tank.tooltip.2: More effective when also adjacent to other water tanks
program.sfm.warnings.unused_label: Label "%s" is used in code but not assigned in the world.
program.sfm.warnings.unknown_resource_ty: The resource type "%s" in "%s" is not supported.
program.sfm.warnings.undefined_label: Label "%s" is assigned in the world but not defined in code.
program.sfm.warnings.disconnected_label: Label "%s" is assigned in the world at %s but not connected by cables.
gui.sfm.manager.button.warning.tooltip:
Click to copy code with warnings and errors.
Shift-click to attempt to fix warnings.
